metadata.title: CVE-2024-38313 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In certain scenarios a malicious website could attempt to display a fakelocation URL bar which could mislead users as to the actual website addressThis vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 127.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
